title: Refrigerator, Washer and Dryer in Unit, Upgraded Cabinets, Disposal
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.
Part of the pleasure of living amidst our Northwest surrounding is feeling at home here.
Set between the Olympic Mountains, Puget Sound and the Cascade Mountain Range, StonePointe at University Place is the perfect choice for Northwest living.
From the professional design, to the spacious interiors and upgraded features, every effort is taken to offer you the most rewarding living environment possible.
Please allow our helpful team to give you a personal tour of the community today.
Washer and Dryer in Unit, Ceiling Fan, Upgraded Cabinets, Balcony or Patio, Dishwasher, Disposal, Walk-In Closets, Fireplace, Storage, Refrigerator, Microwave
Business Center, Clubhouse, Spa/Hot Tub, Fitness Center, Extra Storage, Pet Friendly, Pool
We welcome pets of all sizes, with a maximum of 2 pets per apartment.
We do ask for $300 pet fee per pet, a $100 deposit and $25 monthly pet rent, per pet.
The following breeds are restricted: Pit Bull Terrier, Rottweiler, Doberman Pinscher, Mastiff, Chow, Dalmatian, Akita and Queensland Shepard, or any mixed breed of such.
Use the link below for more details:
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
